text: Ganden Phodrang was the Tibetan government established by the 5th Dalai Lama, which lasted until the 2011, when the 14th Dalai Lama devolved power to a democratically elected Lobsang Sangay Prime Minister, also known as Sikyong. Ganden Phodrang may also refer to: * The estate of the Dalai Lamas at Drepung Monastery of the same name. * The labrang, or the institution of the Dalai Lamas. * The Tibetan Government in Exile, see Central Tibetan Administration.
title: Ganden Phodrang (disambiguation)
